argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | isassa.v | |- V = ( Base ` W ) |
| 2 |  | isassa.f | |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) |
| 3 |  | isassa.b | |- B = ( Base ` F ) |
| 4 |  | isassa.s | |- .x. = ( .s ` W ) |
| 5 |  | isassa.t | |- .X. = ( .r ` W ) |
| 6 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 | #P_assalem | |- ( ( W e. AssAlg /\ ( A e. B /\ X e. V /\ Y e. V ) ) -> ( ( ( A .x. X ) .X. Y ) = ( A .x. ( X .X. Y ) ) /\ ( X .X. ( A .x. Y ) ) = ( A .x. ( X .X. Y ) ) ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_simpld | |- ( ( W e. AssAlg /\ ( A e. B /\ X e. V /\ Y e. V ) ) -> ( ( A .x. X ) .X. Y ) = ( A .x. ( X .X. Y ) ) ) |
